statements: DELETE FROM bill_payments WHERE bill_name = 'Electricity Bill';
DELETE FROM bill_due_dates WHERE bill_id = 100 AND due_date < '2021-10-15';
DELETE FROM bill_amounts WHERE amount >= 1000 AND bill_id = 200;
DELETE FROM bills WHERE bill_name = 'Electricity Bill';
DELETE FROM bills WHERE due_date < '2022-01-01' AND amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM recurring_entries WHERE recurring_type = 'monthly' AND time_interval = 12
DELETE FROM PaymentHistory WHERE customer_id = 100 AND payment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Customers WHERE name = 'John Doe' AND email = 'johndoe@example.com';
